interface.name: QueryExp
interface.javadoc:
Represents relational constraints similar to database query "where clauses". Instances of QueryExp are returned by the static methods of the{@link Query} class.

It is possible, but not recommended, to create custom queries by implementing this interface. In that case, it is better to extend the {@link QueryEval} class than to implement the interface directly, so that the {@link #setMBeanServer} method works correctly. MBeanServer#queryNames MBeanServer.queryNames 1.5

Applies the QueryExp on an MBean.
name The name of the MBean on which the QueryExp will be applied.
True if the query was successfully applied to the MBean, false otherwise
BadStringOperationException
BadBinaryOpValueExpException
BadAttributeValueExpException
InvalidApplicationException

Sets the MBean server on which the query is to be performed.
s The MBean server on which the query is to be performed.
